Description_lang: Every time you dodge an attack, the remaining cooldown of Breath of Fire is reduced by ${$s1/10}.1 sec.

name_blz.es_ES: Item - Monk T21 Brewmaster 4P Bonus - Dodging Resets Breath of Fire CD

description_blz.en_US: Every time you dodge an attack, the remaining cooldown of Breath of Fire is reduced by 2.0 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Cada vez que esquivas un ataque, el tiempo de reutilización restante de Aliento de fuego se reduce 2.0 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ao esquivar-se de um ataque, a recarga restante de Baforada de Fogo é reduzida em 2,0 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Immer wenn Ihr einem Angriff ausweicht, wird die verbleibende Abklingzeit von 'Feuerodem' um 2,0 Sek. verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Every time you dodge an attack, the remaining cooldown of Breath of Fire is reduced by 2.0 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Cada vez que esquivas un ataque, el tiempo de reutilización restante de Aliento de Fuego se reduce 2,0 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Chaque fois que vous esquivez une attaque, le temps de recharge restant de Souffle de feu est réduit de 2,0 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Schivare un attacco riduce il tempo di recupero restante di Soffio di Fuoco di 2,0 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда вы уклоняетесь от атаки, оставшееся время восстановления "Пламенного дыхания" сокращается на 2,0 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 공격을 회피할 때마다 불의 숨결의 남은 재사용 대기시간이 2.0초씩 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你每次閃避攻擊，火焰吐息剩餘的冷卻時間就縮短2.0秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你每躲闪一次攻击，火焰之息的剩余冷却时间就会缩短2.0秒。
